title: Brazil, Olympics Among Big Topics at Agent@Home Travel Summit Workshops
text:
Last updated: 10:19 AM ET, Fri September 18 2015 Brazil, Olympics Among Big Topics at Agent@Home Travel Summit Workshops Travel Agent | Trafalgar Tours | Janeen Christoff | September 18, 2015 
PHOTO: The view high above Rio de Janeiro. (courtesy EMBRATUR) 
Brazil is top of mind these days with the Olympic Games scheduled to take place in the summer of 2016. The games are a big draw for visitors as are Brazilâ€™s iconic places such as Iguassa Falls, Rio De Janeiro, Bahia, Sao Paulo and more.
